name: Footsteps (BatJak03)
description:
Footsteps A Quarantine Jam Entry by Jack Pavey Made in 2 days (REQUIRES HEADPHONES)

Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • Space - Jump
  • Mouse - Camera
  • Left Mouse Button - Shoot

Aim of the game:

  • Find three Key-Cards to escape.
  • Avoid and kill the invisible enemies - listen carefully to their footsteps to locate them.
  • Watch your Ammo - you don't get many shots but you can pick up ammo collectables scattered across the map.
